docs.lead_paragraph: Rows of empty baby carriages outside the auditorium, rows of seated mothers and babies inside, dignitaries ensconced on the platform and silver loving cups ranged on the table -- in this setting yesterday afternoon the Red Hook Tenants Council prepared to reward the Red Hook Housing Project's healthiest mothers and babies.

headline.main: RED HOOK HONORS MOTHERS, CHILDREN; Tenants Council Gives Silver Cups to Ten Healthiest Pairs at the Project SUBSIDIARY PRIZES TO 24 Speakers' Voices Drowned Out by Squalling of Hundreds of Infant Contestants
